title: Balconies and Birds
alt: A weathered yellow building with intricate architectural details stands against a pale blue sky. Several balconies, adorned with ornate railings, offer glimpses into the life within. Pigeons perch on the rooftop and balconies, adding a sense of liveliness to the tranquil scene. The faded paint reveals the texture of history, contrasting with the vibrant, living elements of the urban environment.
